name: Fortz II
description:
Some kind of Factorio/Mindustry hybrid, the end product of several years of increasingly less terrible factory games. Collect resources and defend your base against increasingly dangerous waves of enemies!

Very WIP atm, additional tiers of materials (along with a rather unique power system and fluids) planned, as well as being able to save your progress.

Good luck working out what everything does, help is also coming soon.

Controls:

  • WASD: move
  • Left click: Destroy
  • Right click: Build
  • Scroll/ QE: Rotate Cursor
